original_text: From Judah's tribe, there were 6,800 men who carried shields and spears. They knew how to fight well.
korean_text: 유다 자손 중에서 방패와 창을 들고 싸움을 준비한 자가 육천팔백 명이요

sentences.original_text: From Judah's tribe, there were 6,800 men
They knew how to fight well
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 잘 싸우는 법을 알고 있었다
